description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 22/03672/FUL: construction traffic management plan (12), construction management plan (15) and construction waste management plan (24) in respect of demolition of all buildings and structures and redevelopment of the site with the erection of three buildings subdivided into seven units for B2 general industrial, B8 storage and distribution, and E(g)(iii) light industrial purposes with ancillary offices, together with associated car parking, servicing and landscape planting.
